titles.title: Blest Be the Tie That Binds (hymn of the churc

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blest be the tie binds Our hearts in Christian love The fellowship of kindred minds Is like to that above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Before our Father's throne We pour our ardent pray'rs Our fears our hopes our aims are one Our comforts and our cares{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We share our mutual woes Our mutual burdens bear And often for each other flows The sympathizing tear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we asunder part It gives us inward pain But we shall still be joined in heart And hope to meet again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From sorrow toil and pain And sin we shall be free And perfect love and oneness reign Through all eternity{/lang-eng}
